```js
const Child = ({ children }) => (
  <div
    style={{
      textAlign: "center",
      cursor: "default",
      height: "100px",
      lineHeight: "100px",
      fontFamily: "Roboto, Arial"
    }}
  >
    {children}
  </div>
);

<div>
  <Ripple>
    <Child>Normal</Child>
  </Ripple>
  <Ripple primary>
    <Child>Primary</Child>
  </Ripple>
  <Ripple accent>
    <Child>Accent</Child>
  </Ripple>
</div>;
```
